recipesJson.name: watermelon iced out part 2 this time it's personal
recipesJson.author: matthewkocanda
recipesJson.description:
Revisiting an old favorite, this time making it more watermelon-y and cold. I don't know man.

NOTES
https://www.reddit.com/r/DIY_eJuice/comments/fyld84/watermelonicedout002_this_time_its_personal/

reviews.text: Great candied watermelon recipe which I'm a sucker for! I left the ws 23 out and enjoyed it quite a bit after like a 3 day steep, I then left and forgot about it for another week or two and it was excellent!

pageContext.name: watermelon iced out part 2 this time it's personal
